description: Sum_{k = 1..n } nearest integer to n/k (if n/k is midway between two numbers take the smaller).
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
mathematica: rnd[n_] := If[Mod[n, 1] > .5, Ceiling[n], Floor[n]]; Table[ Sum[ rnd[ n/k], {k, 1, n} ], {n, 1, 70} ]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 22 2001
